name: Beanie Babies A-Z Quiz Series - O  | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which of these is a horse?
questions.explanation:
Oats.

	Oats is a reddish brown horse with a brown mane.  He has a white blaze on his face. "Hop on my back, we'll have a ballJust hold on tight, so you won't fallOver hills and trails we'll goI won't stop 'till you say 'whoa!'"

questions.text: Which of these is a Spain exclusive?
questions.explanation:
Ole.

	Ole (pronounced oh-lay) is a black bull with cream colored horns.  He is a bull from the running of the bulls from Pamplona. "My name is OLE! I am brave and strongI have a heart of goldEven thought I am just a little bull!"

questions.text: Which of these is a dog?
questions.explanation:
Ooh-La-La.

	Ooh-La-La is a pink poodle.  She is light pink with dark pink hair.  She has a purple collar and purple bows on her ears. "Can you guess my favorite hueTo me, it seems easy to doTake a minute, stop and thinkMy most favorite color's pink!"

questions.text: Which of these is a sea creature?
questions.explanation:
Opie.

	Opie is an octopus.  He has blue eyes, and his body is gray.  He has dark gray suction cups on his tentacles. "I live in the ocean blueHave eight arms and a siphon, tooI squirt black ink and have two eyesMy body fits to any size!"

questions.text: Which of these is a fish?
questions.explanation:
Oriel.

	Oriel is an angel fish.  She is mostly yellow, but has a blue stripe around her eye, a purple stripe right in the middle, and a red stripe right by the tail. "The sweetest fishy in the seaI guess that would be little meYour guardian angel; I'll remain trueAnd keep a very close eye on you!"

questions.text: Which of these is a cat?
questions.explanation:
Orient.

	Orient is a Siamese cat.  Siamese cats are pretty cats, and can have cream fur with brown paws, faces, ears, and sometimes tails. "Every time that you draw nearI'll meow and meow 'til you come hereI like attention that is true'Specially when it comes from you!"

questions.text: Which of these is a big cat?
questions.explanation:
Orion.

	Orion is a lion.  He has a large mane, and his body is mostly a yellowish orange color. "Don't worry that I have this nameThe truth is that I'm very tameThe only hunting I will doWill be to find more friends like you!"

questions.text: Which of these is a dog?
questions.explanation:
Outlaw.

	Outlaw is a black labrador retriever.  He is completely covered in curly black fur.  He wears a red collar. "I think that I got a bad rapJust 'cause I took a tiny scrapI'm sorry; it was a mistakeWho knew they'd miss that t-bone steak!"

questions.text: Which of these is a Cracker Barrel exclusive?
questions.explanation:
Old Timer.

	Old Timer is a brown bear with very soft fabric.  On the left side of his chest, he has a Cracker Barrel symbol.

Autumn.

	Oakdale is a gray mouse with orange highlights.  He holds an acorn and an orange oak leaf.  He has very large ears. "In fall when leaves turn red and goldThe trees are a sight to beholdWith colors so vibrant and lushSuch beauty that it makes me blush!"
